question: How many outcomes are in the event $H_4$ (there are 4 heads on 20 flips of a fair coin)?

answers.feedback: Correct.
No. We are counting a number of outcomes, so it cannot be negative.
No. Recall that  the entire sample space only has 1048576 outcomes. $H_3$ cannot have more outcomes than $S$.
The number of outcomes is 20 choose 4 and can be calculated using the binom() function of SciPy.special.
